snippet.title: Xbox 360 Longplay [081] Triggerheart Exelica
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By: Tsunao 

Shmup by Warashi.

Something about a war, a portal, and some robot girls.  SHMUP!  NO PLOT!

Gameplay is simple:  anchor enemies and fling them at enemies for lots of damage (and points).  Boss forms are determined by how high the Item Counter is.

Since the purpose of a longplay is to showcase a game, I play the game on Easy like a nub with Exelica.  Dirty (no default settings), nub (Easy Moodo and not knowing WHAT the hell to do), non-perfect (didn't fight all of Stage 2 boss forms.) 1CC.  I did try to record Normal with Crueltear after completing the game with Exelica, but I gave up on the first stage. -_-  I also go for the True Ending, which demands spawning Faintear in Stage 1 and Stage 3, which demands having a high Item Counter.  Maybe when I get better at this game (which will be never), I will reupload it on Normal difficulty.  I STILL can't get all the boss forms in Stage 2. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
